english: I have no cramps and i feel strong .
chinese: 我的手脚不会抽筋，我有的是力气。

english: The bleeding may keep my left hand from cramping .
chinese: 淌血会叫我的左手不抽筋。

english: "god help me to have the cramp go," he said .
chinese: “上帝帮助我，让我的抽筋好了吧，”他说。

english: But then he would see the cramped hand .
chinese: 不过，要是那样的话，他就会看到这只抽筋的手了。

english: He was waving his arms and writhing about like one in a fit .
chinese: 他挥动双臂抽筋似地扭来扭去。
抽筋造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I don't want to use any more of that ice water for fear i'd cramp him up .
chinese: 我不想再用冰水淋他了，怕他抽筋。

english: He rubbed the cramped hand against his trousers and tried to gentle the fingers .
chinese: 他把那只抽筋的手放在裤子上擦了一擦，想使手指活动活动。

english: "how do you feel, hand?" he asked the cramped hand that was almost as stiff as rigor mortis .
chinese: “手啊，你觉得怎样呢？”他问那只僵硬得几乎跟死尸一样的抽筋的手。

english: Headache is often present, as are recurring leg cramps and sexual excitement, followed by impotence .
chinese: 常常头痛，同时重复发生腿部抽筋和性欲亢进，后来便是阳虚阳萎。

english: He remained clinging convulsively to the ladder and feeling so limp that he was unable to go down any further for several minutes .
chinese: 他抽筋似地紧抱着梯子，四肢瘫软，好几分钟都不能再往下爬一步。

english: Rest cramps are mainly experienced during the night
chinese: 休息抽筋大多数发生在夜晚。

english: This loss of sodium can cause dehydration and cramping
chinese: 钠流失会造成脱水和抽筋。

english: I ve got a cramp in my neck and get dizzy so easily
chinese: 我经常脖子抽筋，还很容易头晕

english: - gross . mom ! - i have a spastic colon
chinese: -真粗俗！妈妈！ -只不过是肠道抽筋罢了

english: Gross . mom ! - i have a spastic colon
chinese: 真粗俗！妈妈！ -只不过是肠道抽筋罢了
